name: Sweet Meat
summary:
Once upon a time, there were cute characters running happily againsts lovely threats like chainsaws, minefields, kicking unicorns, storms of burning chickens, and a lot more tender dangers. (Cartoonish humor).

Sweet Meat combines the casual gameplay of the genre with an amazing and unique social feature: Twitter users can play God and change the gameplay tweeting with the hash #sweetmeatrunner plus any modifier/threat incorporated to the game. For example, if someone tweet: I want a #chickenstorm in #sweetmeatrunner, lots of burned chickens will fall from the sky on all active player gameplay in Real Time, you can also send it only to a friend, well... an ex one.

Features:
-Gameplay changes via Twitter.
-Lots of characters to discover.
-Simple controls.
-Different scenarios to unlock.
-Share your funniest death and earn rewards.
-Challenging and bizarre daily missions.
-Awesome daily rewards.
-Show-off with insane achievements.
-Challenge your friends and climb on the leaderboards!
